Find booth locations where you want to watch.
Check for performances schedule and enjoy!

string-array.name: finding_booth_child
string-array.item: * Go to \"\ Find Booth\"\ Screen.
* Select the Floor the find the booth.
* Click the booth area you found to see details.

string-array.name: checking_performance_schedule_child
string-array.item: * Go to \"\ Performance Schedule\"\ Screen.
* You can see Performance schedules in the screen.
* Find and click the schedule you want to see the details.
* You can use share button to share the information.

string-array.name: sending_feedback_child
string-array.item: * Send Feedback after attending the festival.
* To Send Feedback to the Developer, Use \"\ Send Feedback to the developer via email\"\ which is located in \"\ About\"\ Screen.
* To Send Feedback about the festival, Use \"\ Send Feedback about the Festival to the Current(2014.12.29) Zion High School Student Council\"\ which is also located in \"\About\"\ Screen.
* To Send Feedback about each booth or performance, Click \"\ Send Feedback\"\ Button which can be found in each booth or performance details screen.

string-array.name: downloading_data_child
string-array.item: * Go to \"\ About\"\ Screen and Select \"\ Download Data for Offline \"\
* Once you have download data, you can see details about each booth or performance without network connection.

resources.string: Thank you for using this Baekhyang Festival 2014 App. Hope this app is useful for you during the festival. Learn how to use this app before using it. To Continue, Click The Next Button.

Use Find Booth feature to find where and what the booth is. and Use Performance Schedule feature to Check Performances. If you have any trouble while using this app, read the Help or contact to the developer.

Send Feedback after attending the festival.
 To Send Feedback to the Developer, Use "\ Send Feedback to the developer via email"\ which is located in "\ About"\ Screen.
 To Send Feedback about the festival, Use "\ Send Feedback about the Festival to the Current(2014.12.29) Zion High School Student Council"\ which is also located in "\About"\ Screen.
 To Send Feedback about each booth or performance, Click "\ Send Feedback"\ Button which can be found in each booth or performance details screen.
You can download all data for offline. \n Click Download Data below button to download now.
Now you are ready to use this app. \n Click Finish Button to close this screen.
Downloading Booth Information and Performance Schedule data
